alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Eastland; Stephens (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 7:05AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Eastland, Stephens and Comanche Counties through 800 AM CDT... At 704 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Moran to near Atwell to near Coleman. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds 40 to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Breckenridge, Comanche, Eastland, Cisco, Ranger, De Leon, Gorman, Rising Star, Gustine, Necessity, Gunsight and Carbon. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 324 and 363. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
